column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I decided to bake a cake for my daughter 's birthday last week .
#text=First I gathered the ingredients I needed - eggs , flour , sugar , oil , butter , and decorations !
#text=I put it all out on the counter and then got my supplies .
#text=I needed measuring cups , bowls , a wooden spoon , and some cake pans .
#text=I measured out the dry ingredients I needed and then mixed it up , then mixed in the wet ingredients .
#text=I put it all in my Kitchen Aid mixer and mixed it for a while .
#text=My daughter likes purple and green , so I split the batter into half and dyed some of the batter purple and some teal , using gel food coloring .
#text=I poured the batter in cake pans coated in cooking spray and baked them .
#text=Once they were ready to be decorated , I simply used some cream cheese frosting from a can .
#text=Then I stuck some candles in it and wrote , '' `` Happy birthday ! '' ''
#text=on top with some colored gel icing .
